QuestData.Title: Mantid Under Fire
QuestData.Description: The mantid are attacking again, and we're a bit short-handed up on the wall. In hopes that you'd help, I saved one of the more fun posts for you: the hot oil!$B$BIt's a bit more violent and a bit less scandalous than it sounds.$B$BIt's simple really. Get up on the wall, find one of the oil stations, and dump it on any of the mantid pouring up against the wall. It's very effective.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use a Hot Oil Cauldron to kill 80 mantid near the Gate of the Setting Sun.
